name: TrebbleTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We want to help content Creators take advantage of the growing voice space! and in order to do so we decided to give you guys some tips and tricks we have learned from our users to help you deliver more value to your consumers :)

Do you have your own news and stories you would like to share? Visit the Trebble website at https://www.trebble.fm to create your own Trebble station for free and broadcast your voice to the millions of people with an assistant-powered device.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
